name: Reverse Drain Challenge
summary: You are a fairly powerful, experienced player of the Night Games. Normally, it would be no problem to beat the rookies who are joining tonight; your skills eclipse theirs in pretty much every way. However, these particular rookies have a distinct advantage: Whenever you cum inside any of them, they will drain a level from you. They are also almost impossible to finish off without sex. And you're naked. Can you maintain your lead, or will you get drained into submission?
